item.title: I Can't Feel My Muscles
item.description:
The 'I Can't Feel My Muscles' comes with one Silver watch face and one Robin's Egg Blue strap. The watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your Modify collection. The strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material and the face is made ..

Price: $45.00
